relation: Firefox internal option for enabling strict debug info
Specifies whether info popups shall be shown inside Firebug
Specifies whether the Command Editor shall be shown instead of the Command Line
Specifies whether the Command Line Popup should always be shown
Previous Firebug UI placement within the browser (0-unknown, 1-in browser, 2-in a new window, 3-minimized
Specifies whether the JavaScript error count shall be shown besides the Status Bar Icon
Specifies, whether the Side Panels shall be oriented vertically or horizontally
Specifies whether Firebug shall be enabled by default for all websites
List of panels, that are not shown inside the Panel Bar (separated by a space)
Minimal width in pixels of the Panel tabs inside the Panel Bar when there is not enough horizontal space
Maximum amount of characters for link labels to source files (displayed e. g. in Style Side Panel or Console Panel)
If Firebug version is bigger than the one in this string, a first-run welcome page is displayed
Specifies whether to show the first run page
Specifies whether to activate Firebug for all pages at the same URL
Set to true if the start-button has been initially appended into Firefox toolbar
Set to true, if Firefox addon-bar has been initially opened for the user (to see the status bar icon at least the first time)
If true, Firebug shows a notification message when break in debugger happens (break on debugger; keyword, break on an error, etc.)
Default length limit for cropped strings
Set to true, if the built-in Inspect Element menu item should be removed from Firefox page context menu
Specifies whether Firebug should not be loaded on browser start
Specifies whether Firebug should use Orion for the Command Editor
Specifies whether seaching inside the Panels is case sensitive
Specifies whether to search in multiple files when seaching inside the Panels
Specifies whether to use regular expressions for seaching inside the Panels
Specifies whether to search inside the headers of the requests inside the Net Panel
Specifies whether to search inside the parameters of the requests inside the Net Panel
Specifies whether to search inside the response of the requests inside the Net Panel
Specifies whether to show JavaScript errors inside the Console Panel
Specifies whether to show JavaScript warnings inside the Console Panel
Specifies whether to show CSS errors inside the Console Panel
Specifies whether to show XML errors inside the Console Panel
Specifies whether to show browser and extensions internal errors inside the Console Panel
Specifies whether to show browser and extensions internal messages inside the Console Panel
Specifies whether to show network communication errors inside the Console Panel
Specifies whether to show XMLHttpRequests inside the Console Panel
Specifies whether to show the stack trace for JavaScript errors inside the Console Panel
Maximal number of log messages shown inside the Console Panel
Specifies whether the Console Panel is enabled
Maximal height in pixels of tabular Console Panel entries
Type of messages shown inside the Console Panel
Allows more exact matching of source code at the cost of performance
Specifies whether to display comment nodes inside the HTML Panel
Specifies whether to display white space characters in text nodes inside the HTML Panel

Specifies how entities shall be displayed within the HTML Panel; names displays the entity name if there is one, symbols displays the characters in symbolic form and unicode displays them in their Unicode representation
Specifies whether to display the whole content of text nodes inside the HTML Panel
Specifies whether to highlight changes on elements inside the HTML Panel
Specifies whether to expand changes on elements inside the HTML Panel
Specifies whether to scroll to elements inside the HTML Panel when they are changed
Specifies whether to show the box model while hovering an element inside the HTML Panel or just mark it with a frame
Specifies whether to display a popup with information when hovering an element inside the HTML Panel
Specifies whether to show the default CSS styles defined by the browser inside the Style Side Panel
Specifies whether to expand shorthand properties inside the Style Side Panel
Toggles the Break On Errors feature
Specifies whether Firebug shouldn't be activated for browser internal URLs
Maximal line length for scripts displayed inside the Script Panel
Specifies whether to track throw/catch blocks inside the Script Panel
Specifies whether the Script Panel is enabled
Type filter used for the Script Location Menu
The number of spaces to use when replacing tab characters
Specifies whether to omit the display of the object path stack inside the Stack Side Panel
Specifies whether to display user-defined properties inside the DOM Panel/Side Panel
Specifies whether to display user-defined functions inside the DOM Panel/Side Panel
Specifies whether to display DOM properties inside the DOM Panel/Side Panel
Specifies whether to display DOM functions inside the DOM Panel/Side Panel
Specifies whether to display DOM constants inside the DOM Panel/Side Panel
Specifies whether to display inline event handlers inside the DOM Panel/Side Panel
How many properties to show in object summaries
Specifies whether only enumerable properties shall be shown inside the DOM Panel
Specifies whether only an object's own properties shall be shown inside the DOM Panel
Specifies whether to display rulers when hovering the parts of the box model inside the Layout Side Panel
File type filter used inside the Net Panel's Request List
Maximal number of entries inside the Net Panel
Specifies whether the Net Panel is enabled
Maximal size in bytes of the response body for the preview inside the request info of a request inside the Request List
Maximal size in bytes of the POST body for preview inside the request info inside the Request List
List of hidden columns inside the Net Panel (separated by a space)
Time span in milliseconds, after which the waterfall graph inside the Net Panel is broken
Number of decimal places for the display of the file size inside the Net Panel
Maximal number of characters of the request parameter names displayed in the request info inside the Net Panel
Specifies whether DOM paint events shall be shown as vertical lines inside the Net Panel
Specifies whether HTTP responses coming from the BFCache should be displayed inside the Net Panel
Height of the HTML preview of a request inside the Net Panel
If true, JSON preview in the Net Panel is sorted by keys
List of additional mime-types (separated by space), that should be also cached by Firebug's internal cache
Maximum size limit for cached and displayed network responses
List of names of configured external editors
Delay logs (e.g. in the Console panel) and continue after timeout.
Maximal number of characters after which the lines in the text of response bodies inside the Net Panel are wrapped
Maximal number of characters for displayed attribute values inside HTML Panel
Maximal number highlighted elements on the page (e.g. when hovering arrays of elements inside the Console Panel)
Set to true, if only applied styles should be shown inside the Style Side Panel for the element selected in the Node View
Specifies whether Mozilla specific styles shall be displayed inside the Computed Side Panel
Specifies, whether to display the CSS properties inside the Computed Style Panel grouped by category or alphabetically
Specifies, whether to edit the source code of the CSS inside the CSS Panel or the live view returned by Firefox
Specifies how CSS color values shall be displayed; hex = hexadecimal format, rgb = RGB(A) format, hsl = HSL(A) format
Set to true, if Firebug should use default (en-US) locale instead of the current Firefox locale
List of modules (separated by a space)
numerical value (0=Tab width is not reduced)
numerical value (0=Label width is not reduced)
console, html, css, script, dom, net
numerical value between -1 and 2 (-1=all in bytes)

textBeforeTable: Main preferences 5 See also 4 Tracing options 3 Preferences from older versions 2 Keyboard shortcut preferences 1 Main preferences Contents Firebug adds several configuration options to Firefox. Some of these options can be changed through the UI, others can be manipulated only via about:config. The following table is a list of all preferences Firebug is having (all preferences besides javascript.options.strict.debug are starting with "extensions.firebug.", but for space reasons this is left out). Revision as of 13:37, 29 October 2012 [[FBTrace Preferences]] +   == See also == +   +   ''Note:'' The defaults for these preferences were moved to their own file in FBTrace 1.8, so it's easier to remove them for final releases. +   +   |} |}
textAfterTable: Keyboard shortcut preferences Option Description Valid Values Default UI Equivalents Added in key.shortcut.reenterCommand Keyboard shortcut for re-entering a command key constants seperated by spaces "control shift e" Firebug Menu->Customize Shortcuts->Reenter Command - key.shortcut.toggleInspecting Keyboard shortcut for toggling the Inspector key constants seperated by spaces "accel shift c" Firebug Menu->Customize Shortcuts->Toggle Inspecting - key.shortcut.toggleQuickInfoBox Keyboard shortcut for toggling the Quick Info Box key constants seperated by spaces "accel shift i" Firebug Menu->Customize Shortcuts->Toggle Quick Info Box - key.shortcut.toggleProfiling Keyboard shortcut for toggling profiling key constants seperated by spaces "accel shift p" Firebug Menu->Customize Shortcuts->Toggle Profiling - key.shortcut.focusCommandLine Keyboard shortcut for setting the focus to the Command Line key constants seperated by spaces "accel shift l" Firebug Menu->Customize Shortcuts->Focus Command Line - key.shortcut.focusFirebugSearch Keyboard shortcut for setting the focus to the Search Field key constants seperated by spaces
